title: Bollore And Vivendi Get Back In Gaming With Strategic Stakes In Ubisoft and Gameloft
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
French media group Vivendi has taken unsolicited minority stakes in two French-based video game firms that have reacted prickly to what they...
